synopsis.text: Following the debut of their first full-length album in the U.S., Sony Music Direct (Japan), Inc., a subsidiary of Sony Music Entertainment Japan, Inc., is thrilled to introduce a new EP by the renowned Japanese pop artist/group, Ryo (Supercell). The EP's title track, 'SEKIRANUN GRAFFITI' (Thundercloud Graffiti), serves as the theme song for the highly anticipated Hatsune Miku PROJECT DIVA arcade console game and PSP video game, set to launch in Japan this autumn. The EP also features a fresh single, 'Fallin' Fallin' Fallin',' a collaboration between Ryo and the acclaimed Japanese Vocaloid producer, Dixie Flatline. The SEKIRANUN GRAFFITI EP includes instrumental and remixed versions of both tracks, with cover art designed by Atsuya Uki. In the accompanying anime, a young girl embarks on a magical journey with Miku Hatsune, soaring through the skies and exploring enchanting destinations.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
